item.title: How to Automate Your GitHub Profile With Markscribe
item.description: see generated README.md â†“ Markscribe Markscribe is a tool that allows you to generate markdown content using templates and interact with GitHub and RSS feeds. It can be run as a GitHub Action and offers various functions like rendering templates, accessing GitHub data, and working with GoodReads API. This is useful if you want to generate a README.md automatically on GitHub. For example you can add things such as: what you are working on,latest projects, recent stars, etc.
